snippet: The events taking place in eastern Ukraine are very similar to those that led up to Russia’s annexation of Crimea. Does the West have a response ready?
abstract: Editorial warns that events in Donetsk and eastern Ukraine are very similar to those that led up to Russia's annexation of Crimea; calls on the United States and Europe to respond with extensive sanctions should Russia continue along the path of aggression.
lead_paragraph: The events taking place in eastern Ukraine are very similar to those that led up to Russia’s annexation of Crimea. Does the West have a response ready?
